title: Synchronous Virtual Meeting-Integrated Curriculum for Supporting Online Non-Traditional Doctoral Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Graduate-level academic research methodologies and basic digital communication competencies
context.additional_context: A doctoral-level educational support program in social domains conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment, where most learners are working professionals or job seekers requiring flexible time management.

learning_goals: Learners can explain a step-by-step synchronous online collaboration strategy from selecting a doctoral dissertation topic to completion
Learners can apply an academic content production process using real-time discussion and feedback in mobile environments
Learners can design an online research schedule management system based on Heutagogy principles for self-managed learning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
